intro: Canavalia dolichoides, commonly known as the longpod morning glory, is a flowering plant belonging to the Fabaceae family. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas and is characterized by its climbing habit and showy blue or violet flowers. The plant produces elongated, bean-like pods that contain several seeds. It thrives in well-drained soils and requires full sun for optimal growth. Canavalia dolichoides is often used in ornamental gardening due to its attractive blooms and vigorous growth.
